00068         B3_FORCE_INLINE void    getVelocityInLocalPointObsolete(const b3Vector3& rel_pos, b3Vector3& velocity ) const
00069         {
00070                 if (m_originalBody)
00071                         velocity = m_linearVelocity+m_deltaLinearVelocity + (m_angularVelocity+m_deltaAngularVelocity).cross(rel_pos);
00072                 else
00073                         velocity.setValue(0,0,0);
00074         }
00075 
00076         B3_FORCE_INLINE void    getAngularVelocity(b3Vector3& angVel) const
00077         {
00078                 if (m_originalBody)
00079                         angVel =m_angularVelocity+m_deltaAngularVelocity;
00080                 else
00081                         angVel.setValue(0,0,0);
00082         }
00083 
00084 
00085         //Optimization for the iterative solver: avoid calculating constant terms involving inertia, normal, relative position
00086         B3_FORCE_INLINE void applyImpulse(const b3Vector3& linearComponent, const b3Vector3& angularComponent,const b3Scalar impulseMagnitude)
00087         {
00088                 if (m_originalBody)
00089                 {
00090                         m_deltaLinearVelocity += linearComponent*impulseMagnitude*m_linearFactor;
00091                         m_deltaAngularVelocity += angularComponent*(impulseMagnitude*m_angularFactor);
00092                 }
00093         }
00094 
00095         B3_FORCE_INLINE void internalApplyPushImpulse(const b3Vector3& linearComponent, const b3Vector3& angularComponent,b3Scalar impulseMagnitude)
00096         {
00097                 if (m_originalBody)
00098                 {
00099                         m_pushVelocity += linearComponent*impulseMagnitude*m_linearFactor;
00100                         m_turnVelocity += angularComponent*(impulseMagnitude*m_angularFactor);
00101                 }
00102         }
00103
